content: SPX Abrasive Diamond Cup-Wheel (For DG/DGH 150) Ultimate diamond cup wheel for the DG/DGH 150 diamond grinder – for grinding green and abrasive concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-performance diamond cup wheel designed for fast grinding on green concrete Long lifetime, especially on abrasive materials, thanks to the special segment matrix and advanced cooling Low vibration thanks to advanced core balancing technology Engineered for reliability – CD welding and highest-grade materials used throughout Applications Grinding green, young and highly abrasive concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 Base material: Green concrete, Screed Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 | Base material | Green concrete, Screed | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2270823 - Diamond cup wheel SPX 6 Abrasive - Package Size 1 pc
